newsitem.title: USA: Tangram Enterprise names John Nelli CFO.
newsitem.headline: Tangram Enterprise names John Nelli CFO.

text.p: Tangram Enterprise Inc said John Nelli has been named chief financial officer of Tangram Enterprise Solutions Inc.

As CFO, Nelli will be responsible for all finance, regulatory and administrative functions. Additionally, he will be responsible for managing the capital requirements for Tangram and will actively participate in the investor relations functions.

Prior to joining Tangram, Nelli served as the senior vice president of finance, and chief accounting officer of FAC Realty Inc, a publicly traded real estate investment trust, based in Cary, N.C. Prior to FAC, Nelli was chief financial officer of Litchfield Theatres Ltd, a regional motion picture exhibitor with theaters in six southeastern states.
